opendb_id.description: Unique identifier for the document (UUID v4)

chipset_manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the GPU chipset (e.g., NVIDIA, AMD, Intel)

chipset.description: The specific GPU chipset (e.g., GeForce RTX 4090, Radeon RX 7900 XTX, ARC B580, etc)

memory.description: The amount of video memory in GB

memory_type.description: The type of video memory (e.g., GDDR6X, GDDR6)

core_base_clock.description: The base clock speed of the GPU core in MHz

core_boost_clock.description: The boost clock speed of the GPU core in MHz

interface.description: The interface used by the graphics card (e.g., PCIe 4.0 x16, PCIe 5.0 x16)

color.description: The color of this product (e.g., ['Black', 'Red']). Each color of the product should be included in the array.

frame_sync.description: The frame synchronization technology supported (e.g., G-Sync, FreeSync, None)

length.description: The length of the graphics card in mm

tdp.description: The Thermal Design Power of the graphics card in Watts

case_expansion_slot_width.description: The number of case expansion slot widths the card occupies

total_slot_width.description: The total slot width the card occupies, accounting for cooler size

cooling.description: The type of cooling solution (e.g., 3 Fans, 2 Fans, Blower, Water Cooled)

pcie_8_pin.description: Number of 8-pin PCIe connectors (150W each). A 16-pin PCIe connector is 2x 8-pin PCIe connectors

general_product_information.description: General product information and retailer SKUs
